name: animitter
description: Animitter is an animation loop + EventEmitter for browser, node, browserify or amd.

scripts.test: npm run tsc && npm run test-existing
scripts.build: npm run tsc && browserify -p [ tsify ] ./index.js --standalone animitter | node prepend-banner.js > animitter.js && uglifyjs animitter.js > animitter.min.js

author: Kyle Phillips
